summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

This document appears to be a list of recommended texts for a Keeper in a Cthulhu Mythos setting, specifically those related to the worship of Cthulhu and other Outer Gods. The texts include "Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan", "True Magick", and "Zanthu Tablets", which are said to contain information on summoning and binding spirits, as well as the worship of various deities. Reading these texts is said to result in a loss of sanity, with varying degrees of severity depending on the text and the individual Keeper. The document also notes that reading occult books can add to the Occult skill, but does not incur a sanity cost.

qa_pairs.question: What is the suggested duration for studying the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
What are some suggested spells for the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
qa_pairs.answer: Call Down Spirit (Summon/Bind Byakhee), Call Forth the Earth Spirit (Contact Ch-thonian), Contact Ghoul, Contact Hound of Tin-dalos, Contact Deity/Nyarlathotep, Door to Kadath (a Gate to Kadath), Restore Life (Resurrection).

qa_pairs.question: What is the Mythos Rating of the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
What is the Cthulhu Mythos bonus to the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
What is the Sanity Loss associated with the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan?
In what year was the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan published?
In what year was the second edition of the Thaumaturgical Prodigies In The New-England Canaan published?
What is the suggested study period for True Magick?
What is the suggested study period for English, by Theophilus Wenn?
What is the suggested spells for English, by Theophilus Wenn?
qa_pairs.answer: Annotations by Rev. Phillips in his personal copy reveal Call/Dismiss Ithaka (Ithaqua), Contact Deity/Narlato (Nyarlathotep), Contact Deity/Sadogowah (Tsathoggua), Contact Deity/Yogge Sothyothe (Yog-Sothoth), Elder Sign.

qa_pairs.question: What is the suggested study period for English, by Theophilus Wenn?
What is the suggested spells for True Magick?
qa_pairs.answer: Suggested Spells: none, but annotations by Rev. Phillips in his personal copy reveal Call/Dismiss Ithaka (Ithaqua), Contact Deity/Narlato (Nyarlathotep), Contact Deity/Sadogowah (Tsathoggua), Contact Deity/Yogge Sothyothe (Yog-Sothoth), Elder Sign.

qa_pairs.question: What is the suggested spells for English, by Theophilus Wenn?
qa_pairs.answer: Suggested Spells: Call for Spirit of the Air (Summon/Bind Star Vampire), Call Forth the One (Summon/Bind Servitor of the Outer Gods), Call Forth the Winged One (Summon/Bind Byakhee), Speak with the Dark One (Contact Deity/Nyogtha).

qa_pairs.question: How many weeks are required to study the text?
What is the suggested Magick rating of the text?
What is the suggested Magick rating of the Zanthu Tablets text?
How many weeks are required to study the Zanthu Tablets text?
What is the suggested Magick rating of the English text, 'True Magick'?
What is the estimated number of copies printed of the Zanthu Tablets brochure?
What is the translation of the carvings found on black jade tablets?
qa_pairs.answer: Translates carvings found on black jade tablets

qa_pairs.question: What is the high language of ancient Mu according to the author?
qa_pairs.answer: the high language of ancient Mu

qa_pairs.question: Which deities are mentioned in the original Muvian tables?
qa_pairs.answer: Contact Deity/Cthulhu, Ghatanothoa, Lloigor, Yuggya, and Zoth-Ommog

qa_pairs.question: How many weeks is the recommended study period for this material?
What is the name of the high language mentioned in the text?
What is the recommended increase to the Occult skill after reading an occult book?
